title: Handle BOPIS Order Cancellation
description: A customer's 'Buy Online, Pick up In Store' order was not picked up within the 7-day window and needs to be cancelled.

tasks.description: A system job identifies BOPIS orders that have exceeded the pickup time limit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system flags the abandoned order.

tasks.description: The system automatically cancels the order and triggers a refund to the customer's original form of payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: The order is cancelled, and the refund process is initiated.

tasks.description: A task is created for a store associate to return the items from the staging area back to the sales floor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inventory is returned to a sellable state.
